body.p: I am well acquainted with James H Monroe and Met him in Lebanon last september or october he was Drafted and put in a substitute by the Name of John ayrs ayers the said ayers was Bailed out of the Louisville Jail I assisted Monroe in putting the said John ayers in as a substitute in said James H Monroes place
subscribed & sworn to before the undersigned by Westly Phelps June 19th 1865

L Hogland
P J B C C
